title: Synthetic Recap
body:
ORLANDO – On a night when the Miami Heat needed a historic performance, Tim Hardaway delivered a masterpiece.

Hardaway exploded for a career-high 38 points, willing the Heat to a decisive 102-88 victory over the Orlando Magic. From the opening tip, it was clear the veteran guard was in a special rhythm, carving up the Orlando defense with a dazzling array of deep threes and his signature crossover.

While Alonzo Mourning provided a powerful interior presence with 19 points and 10 rebounds, this was unequivocally Hardaway’s show. His scoring barrage was the engine of the Miami offense, leaving the Magic scrambling for answers that never came. The Heat, feeding off their leader’s energy, methodically built their lead and never relented.

Orlando was led by Rony Seikaly’s 24 points and 13 rebounds, but the team had no counterpunch for the hurricane in a Heat uniform. As Hardaway’s point total climbed, the Magic’s hopes faded, the home crowd witnessing a singular performance they couldn’t help but applaud.

In the annals of Heat history, this will be remembered as the night Tim Hardaway ascended to another plane. It wasn’t just a win; it was a statement, authored by one man’s unforgettable, career-defining brilliance.
